ayas.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ
ayas.translation: Except those who believe, and do good and enjoin truth on one another, and enjoin one another to bear with fortitude (the trials that befall).
ayas.transliteration: illal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti watawāṣaw bil ḥaqqi watawāṣaw biṣ ṣabr
